name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Realyst:Single Family Property Tool for Homeowners and Investors

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to more quickly evaluate the value of a property on Zillow.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
REALYST is designed specifically for Investors, Realtors, Homeowners, & Buyers! If you are looking for an investment property, selling investment properties, own a home, or planning to buy a home, then REALYST is for you!

INVESTORS & REALTORS:
You will benefit from Realyst's ability to optimize your search for rental investment opportunities. Whether you’re just starting out, are a seasoned investor, or assisting clients in their search, Realyst seamlessly integrates with Zillow, enabling you to perform rental property analysis and generate cash on cash calculations, mortgage calculations, and ROI calculations.

HOMEOWNERS & BUYERS:
You will benefit from generated property summaries enriched with nearby sales comparables, neighborhood area trends, and other relevant data, empowering you with the insights needed to make informed decisions whether you’re planning to buy, sell, or just want an update on the market.

========= KEY FEATURES =========

- SOPHISTICATED FINANCIAL MODEL-
Adjustable inputs like rental rate, mortgage rate, vacancy rate, renovation estimates, and more

- COLLECTIVE NEIGHBORHOOD SEARCH ANALYSIS -
With the click of a button, you can instantly compare the profitability of up to 80 nearby properties

- INDIVIDUAL PROPERTY ANALYSIS -
Any single-family home can generate an instant financial summary

- AI INSIGHTS POWERED BY GPT-4 -
5 AI-powered prompts that cover renovation estimates, market trends, and more

- SAVE AND ORGANIZE RESULTS - ABILITY TO EXPORT TO CSV OR PDF -
Easily access the data to analyze further and share with others

- PDF SUMMARY FOR HOMEOWNERS & BUYERS -
A PDF report that shows nearby comps as well as property, neighborhood, and demographic information.

========= 2-DAY FREE TRIAL =========

DISCLAIMER:
Realyst is an advanced tool designed for real estate investment analysis and planning. It should be used solely for informational purposes and does not constitute financial, investment, or tax advice. Before making any investment decisions based on the information provided by Realyst, it is strongly advised to consult with a qualified real estate or financial advisor. Users of Realyst assume all risks associated with its use and are solely responsible for their investment decisions.
